solution_list.title: Torizon
solution_list.description: Simplifying the Development and Operationof Linux IoT Device Torizon makes modern, iterative product development easier by seamlessly integrating hardware, an OS, development tools, remote updates and fleet monitoring. This makes it a scalable solution for devices requiring high reliability and security.

success_case_list.title: Torizon Core OS offered full integration with Qt
success_case_list.description: Toradex is definitely one of the best solution providers for embedded computing devices. We have been using their Apalis iMX6 module customized carrier board for one of our projects. We found the performance of the evaluation kit to be extremely satisfactory and designed a custom carrier board. Torizon Core OS offered full integration with Qt providing a convenient way to use a Ubuntu development PC along advantages of the rich Linux ecosystem which was our prime requirement. Toradex has always been ready to take feedback and support developer in overcoming the challenges with their continuous build releases. Due to their extensive cross-department interaction, the quality of customer support increased multifold.

success_case_list.title: Handheld PCR Testing Device and a Desktop Blood Testing Device
success_case_list.description: A “low-cost, handheld, field-ready automated tool to validate the identity of a wildlife or food product, anywhere in the world, without specialized training, equipment, reagents, or even continuous power.”RND has recently delivered two different medical device software systems using Docker containers running on TorizonCore embedded Linux distribution. These systems include a handheld PCR testing device and a desktop blood testing device. Both of these devices are portable and run 8+ hours on battery power.

success_case_list.title: All-in-one Automotive ADAS, Infotainment, Navigation & IoT Domain Controller
success_case_list.description: Traxen's domain controller is an all-in-one integrated controller that is used in its own advanced AI-based ADAS product. It integrates a high safety integrity module, high-level compute capability, multiple wireless connectivity channels, GPS, IMU, Camera interfaces and a multitude of I/O channel into a single robust automotive controller, iQ-Trax™.

solution_list.title: TorizonCore
solution_list.description: Easy-to-use Industrial Linux Software Platform TorizonCore is an open-source software platform that simplifies the development and maintenance of embedded Linux software. It is designed to be used out-of-the-box on devices requiring high reliability, allowing you to focus on your application and not on building and maintaining the operating system.

solution_list.title: Toradex CoM/SoM
solution_list.description: Computer on Modules (CoM) / System on Modules (SoM) offer reliable and cost-effective embedded platform for building end-products. Toradex offers an extensive range of CoMs using leading Arm based System on Chips (SoC).

solution_list.title: Toradex SBC
solution_list.description: Single Board Computers (SBC) Carrier Boards - A carrier board is a hardware unit that complements a Computer on Module (CoM). The combination of the two is commonly referred to as a single-board computer (SBC). Toradex offers a comprehensive lineup of carrier boards from both our own portfolio and those of our accredited partners. A carrier board provides the necessary signal and power levels to the CoM. It also houses application-specific connectivity and multimedia interfaces, such as USB, Ethernet, UART, HDMI and so on.
